name: i had a little nut tree
lyric:
I had a little nut tree
Nothing would it bear

But a silver nutmeg
And a golden pear
The King of Spain's daughter
Came to visit me

And all for the sake
Of my little nut tree

I had a little nut tree
Nothing would it bear

But a silver nutmeg
And a golden pear

The King of Spain's daughter
Came to visit me

And all for the sake
Of my little nut tree

comments.brief:
好听~
